caption: Transforms
description: The transforms object represents the mapping or transform used.
name: transforms

lang.description: The transformation language used to transform the data.

name.description: The name of the transformation or mapping.

product.description: The product or instance used to make the transformation

uid.description: The unique identifier of the mapping or transformation.

url.description: The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) object describes the characteristics of a URL involving the transform or mapping.
